name: Pro Tools Plugin File
summary: Learn about .DPM files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: In Mac OS X, DPM files should be stored in the "/Library/Application Support/Digidesgin/Plugins" folder.
In Windows, DPM files should be placed in the "\Program Files\Common Files\Digidesign\DAE\Plug-Ins" directory.
NOTE: In order for older plugins to work in Pro Tools 8, the file extension ".dpm" may need to be added to the filename in order for Pro Tools to recognize it.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
